mapper.insert: insert into bg_yy_apply (uuid,apply_code,dept_id,apply_user_id,use_seal_date,use_seal_phone, item_first_id,item_second_id,use_seal_reason,use_seal_status,create_user,create_time,valid) values (#{uuid}, #{applyCode}, #{deptId}, #{applyUserId}, to_date(#{useSealDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{useSealPhone}, #{itemFirstId}, #{itemSecondId}, #{useSealReason}, #{useSealStatus}, #{createUser}, sysdate, '1')
mapper.update: update bg_yy_apply set use_seal_date = to_date(#{useSealDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), use_seal_phone = #{useSealPhone}, item_first_id = #{itemFirstId}, item_second_id = #{itemSecondId}, use_seal_reason = #{useSealReason}, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = sysdate where uuid = #{uuid}
update bg_yy_apply set use_seal_status = #{useSealStatus} where uuid = #{uuid}
update bg_yy_apply set valid ='0' where uuid = #{uuid} and use_seal_status = #{useSealStatus}
mapper.select: select a.uuid, a.apply_code applyCode, a.use_seal_reason useSealReason, a.dept_id applyDeptId, d.deptname applyDept, u.useralias applyUser, a.apply_user_id applyUserId, a.use_seal_phone useSealPhone, TO_CHAR(a.use_seal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') useSealDate, TO_CHAR(a.create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') createTime, s.second_category_name useSealItem, (select name from bg_sys_datadictionary where pcode = 'use_seal_status' and code = a.use_seal_status) useSealStatusValue, a.use_seal_status useSealStatus, a.item_first_id itemFirstId, a.item_second_id itemSecondId, (select replace(wm_concat(nvl(d.name, k.use_seal_value)), ',', ';') useSealKind from bg_yy_kind k, (select * from bg_sys_datadictionary d where d.pcode = 'use_seal_kind' and d.vaild = '1') d where k.use_seal_kind_code = d.code(+) and k.apply_id = a.uuid and k.valid = '1') useSealKind from bg_yy_apply a left join bg_sys_dept d on d.deptId = a.dept_id left join bg_sys_user u on a.apply_user_id = u.userid left join bg_yy_item_second s on a.item_second_id = s.uuid left join bg_yy_item_first f on a.item_first_id = f.uuid where a.uuid = #{uuid}
select substr(apply_code,10) from bg_yy_apply where apply_code LIKE #{date}||'%'

select t.deptcode, t.deptname, t.deptid, decode(t.type, 2, t.pdeptid, 1, t.deptid) pdeptid, decode(t.type, 2, t.pdeptname, 1, t.deptname) pdeptname from bg_sys_dept t where t.deptcode = (select hrdeptcode from bg_sys_user where userid = #{userId} and valid='1') and t.valid='1'
select uuid k,first_category_name v from bg_yy_item_first where valid = '1'
select uuid k, second_category_name v from bg_yy_item_second where first_category_id = #{firstCategoryId} and valid = '1'

SELECT F.SRC, F.ID, F.NEXT_APPROVE_ID, U.USERALIAS, DECODE(D.TYPE, 1, D.DEPTNAME, D.PDEPTNAME) DEPTNAME, F.APPROVE_REMARK, TO_CHAR(F.APPROVE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') APPROVE_DATE, DECODE(RU.NODE, 'FINISH', '结束', DR.NAME) APPROVE_NODE, TO_CHAR((SELECT wm_concat(BSU.USERALIAS) FROM TB_WL_AUDIT_USER AU JOIN BG_SYS_USER BSU ON BSU.USERID = AU.APPROVE_USER WHERE AU.APPROVE_ID = F.NEXT_APPROVE_ID AND BSU.VALID = 1)) NEXT_USERALIAS, TO_CHAR((SELECT wm_concat(BSU.PHONE) FROM TB_WL_AUDIT_USER AU JOIN BG_SYS_USER BSU ON BSU.USERID = AU.APPROVE_USER WHERE AU.APPROVE_ID = F.NEXT_APPROVE_ID AND BSU.VALID = 1)) NEXT_PHONE FROM (SELECT 'APP' SRC, AP.ID, AP.NEXT_APPROVE_ID, AP.APPROVE_USER, AP.APPROVE_REMARK, AP.APPROVE_DATE, to_number(AP.APPROVE_STEP) APPROVE_STEP, AP.APPLY_ID FROM tb_wl_approve ap WHERE ap.valid = '1' AND ap.apply_id = (SELECT r.apply_id FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r WHERE r.valid = '1' AND r.business_id = #{applyId} AND r.create_time = (SELECT max( r1.create_time) create_time FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r1 WHERE r1.valid = '1' AND r1.business_id = #{applyId})) AND NOT exists(SELECT uuid FROM tb_wl_approve_expand ae WHERE ae.approve_id = ap.id) UNION ALL SELECT 'APE' SRC, AP.ID, AP.NEXT_APPROVE_ID, ape.APPROVE_USER, ape.APPROVE_REMARK, ape.APPROVE_DATE, to_number(ape.APPROVE_STEP) APPROVE_STEP, AP.APPLY_ID FROM tb_wl_approve_expand ape LEFT JOIN tb_wl_approve AP ON AP.ID = APE.APPROVE_ID WHERE ape.valid = '1' AND AP.VALID = '1' AND ape.approve_id IN (SELECT ap.id FROM tb_wl_approve ap WHERE ap.valid = '1' AND ap.apply_id = (SELECT r.apply_id FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r WHERE r.valid = '1' AND r.business_id = #{applyId} AND r.create_time = (SELECT max( r1.create_time) create_time FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r1 WHERE r1.valid = '1' AND r1.business_id = #{applyId})))) F LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON F.APPROVE_USER = U.USERID LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON u.hrdeptcode = d.deptcode LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE NX_AP ON NX_AP.ID = F.NEXT_APPROVE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_WL_RULE RU ON RU.ID = NX_AP.APPROVE_NODE LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY DR ON DR.CODE = RU.NODE AND DR.PCODE = 'pb_yygl_status' WHERE U.VALID = 1 AND D.VALID = 1 AND RU.VALID = '1' AND DR.VAILD = 1 AND NX_AP.VALID = '1' ORDER BY F.APPROVE_STEP

SELECT U.USERALIAS, DECODE(D.TYPE, 1, D.DEPTNAME, D.PDEPTNAME) DEPTNAME, F.APPROVE_REMARK, TO_CHAR(F.APPROVE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') APPROVE_DATE, DECODE(RU.NODE, 'FINISH', '结束', DR.NAME) APPROVE_NODE FROM (SELECT 'APP' SRC, AP.ID, AP.NEXT_APPROVE_ID, AP.APPROVE_USER, AP.APPROVE_REMARK, AP.APPROVE_DATE, to_number(AP.APPROVE_STEP) APPROVE_STEP, AP.APPLY_ID FROM tb_wl_approve ap WHERE ap.valid = '1' AND ap.apply_id = (SELECT r.apply_id FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r WHERE r.valid = '1' AND r.business_id = #{businessId} AND r.create_time = (SELECT max( r1.create_time) create_time FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r1 WHERE r1.valid = '1' AND r1.business_id = #{businessId})) AND NOT exists(SELECT uuid FROM tb_wl_approve_expand ae WHERE ae.approve_id = ap.id) UNION ALL SELECT 'APE' SRC, AP.ID, AP.NEXT_APPROVE_ID, ape.APPROVE_USER, ape.APPROVE_REMARK, ape.APPROVE_DATE, to_number(ape.APPROVE_STEP) APPROVE_STEP, AP.APPLY_ID FROM tb_wl_approve_expand ape LEFT JOIN tb_wl_approve AP ON AP.ID = APE.APPROVE_ID WHERE ape.valid = '1' AND AP.VALID = '1' AND ape.approve_id IN (SELECT ap.id FROM tb_wl_approve ap WHERE ap.valid = '1' AND ap.apply_id = (SELECT r.apply_id FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r WHERE r.valid = '1' AND r.business_id = #{businessId} AND r.create_time = (SELECT max( r1.create_time) create_time FROM tb_wl_business_r_apply r1 WHERE r1.valid = '1' AND r1.business_id = #{businessId})))) F LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON F.APPROVE_USER = U.USERID LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON u.hrdeptcode = d.deptcode LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE NX_AP ON NX_AP.ID = F.ID LEFT JOIN TB_WL_RULE RU ON RU.ID = NX_AP.APPROVE_NODE LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY DR ON DR.CODE = RU.NODE AND DR.PCODE = 'pb_yygl_status' WHERE U.VALID = 1 AND D.VALID = 1 AND RU.VALID = '1' AND DR.VAILD = 1 AND NX_AP.VALID = '1' ORDER BY F.APPROVE_STEP
